dialogue.text: M-me? I’m not much of a musician myself-
Sunny. I’m gonna stop you right there. You can NOT be discrediting yourself like that.
I see you on your music program every other night for hours!
And I will admit, I do sneak a listen or two to your music files every now and then. Everything you’ve been making sounds awesome!
Syn- hey! That’s just… for fun, y’know? I'm not a professional.
Sunny, you don't gotta be a pro to make some bangin' tunes!
Oh! There's also your singing too! You've been practicing that a lot as well. You really gotta show the audience the combination of your talents.
The audience-?! Syn, I don't think I'm ready for that.
I wouldn't be pushing this so hard if I didn't think you would do great, Sunny. Please trust me on this.
I won't force you into this if you really don't want to... but I do mean it. I know you're going to do great.
...okay. I trust you, Syn. I'll need your help, though.
You don't gotta ask me twice! I'm right with you!
Strap in, folks! We've got a special performance today, from the two of us here at SynSun!
This song doesn't quite have a proper name yet, but it's a Sunny original! Get ready for this!
